igraphlite 0.10.15.1
  • Reference

Conversion between vertex IDs and names

Source: R/attributes.R
vnames.Rd

Vnames() is equivalent to Vattr() on "name", but is slightly faster. as_vids() and as_vnames() are shorthands using Vnames().

Usage

Vnames(graph)

as_vids(graph, vnames)

as_vnames(graph, vids)

Arguments

graph

An igraph_ptr object.

vnames

Vertex names stored in Vattr(g)$name.

vids

An integer vector of vertex IDs.

Value

Vnames() and as_vnames() return a character vector of vertex names.

as_vids() returns an integer vector of vertex IDs.

Examples

g = graph_create(letters[1:6])
Vnames(g)
#> [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f"
as_vids(g, c("d", "b"))
#> [1] 4 2
as_vnames(g, c(4L, 2L))
#> [1] "d" "b"
